TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SimpleWorkerRequest extends System.Web.HttpWorkerRequest

summary.span: Provides a simple implementation of the abstract class that can be used to host ASP.NET applications outside an Internet Information Services (IIS) application.

span.span: Provides a simple implementation of the abstract class that can be used to host ASP.NET applications outside an Internet Information Services (IIS) application.

summary.span: You can employ directly or extend it.

span.span: You can employ directly or extend it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這項簡單的實作`HttpWorkerRequest`提供要求 URL 和查詢字串，並將擷取到輸出的主體。This simple implementation of `HttpWorkerRequest` provides the request URL and the query string and captures the body of the output into a . 您應該以達到更豐富的功能，提供已張貼的內容和標頭，並擷取回應標頭或回應主體為二進位資料，例如擴充`SimpleWorkerRequest`和覆寫適當`HttpWorkerRequest`方法。To achieve richer functionality, such as providing posted content and headers and capturing the response headers or response body as binary data, you should extend `SimpleWorkerRequest` and override the appropriate `HttpWorkerRequest` methods.

summary.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
